page.title: 07My work in Cardigan.
page.content: Three days a week I drive into Cardigan where I work as a clerk at the Old Oak Insurance Brokers.There are 2 Insurance Brokers in Cardigan but Old Oak is the bigger and longer established office.We have four full time and two part time staff.As Brokers we are agents for approximately twenty Insurance companies.So,for example,when a customer asks for a quotation for his car insurance we are able to compare the rates and cover of several companies thereby giving him a far wider choice than that of an individual Insurance Company.I find the work very interesting as I enjoy meeting and helping people.My time is spent attending to customers,giving quotations,taking premiums and operating the computer.We have 4 VDU's and a printer which is a great help.
